= How to Install googledrivesync_chrome =

== On Windows 32 bits ==

  * Download last version;
  * Unzip file downloaded;
  * Copy all file in "C:\Program Files\Google\Drive";
  * Double-click on googledrivesync_chrome_32.reg

== On Windows 64 bits ==

  * Download last version;
  * Unzip file downloaded;
  * Copy all file in "C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Drive";
  * Double-click on googledrivesync_chrome_64.reg

=== googledrivesync_chrome.reg ===

This file replace googledrivesync.exe by googledrivesync_chrome.wsf for openning all google documents with Google Chrome.
